Html:
Hi Marteen,

i'm testing the version 1.6.1. Good job !

I notice a very strange thing :
when I set the background color of a cell to grey with the Excel tools in the xlsx from which I buid the excel file,  this cell becomes black after the reader php process.
I can send you my files if you want.

Regards,

Laurent

Can you please send me the items? (or create a new issue and attach the example to the issue)

Thanks!
Try changing the "gray" color on your sheet, it semes that PHPExcel can not determine the color to use.

maartenba wrote:
Try changing the "gray" color on your sheet, it semes that PHPExcel can not determine the color to use.


Hi Marteen,

its works with any other color !
I change to :
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle('D1')->getFill()->getStartColor()->setARGB('B7B7B7');

and it's ok now.

Thanks.

Laurent.
